video.title: Nikita
video.synopsis: Nikita, one of the most highly skilled assassins on earth, targets the mysterious corporation that turned her and other at-risk teens into killers.

episodes.synopsis: Maggie Q stars as the rogue Nikita, who is determined to bring down the very agency that trained her to be an assassin.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Percy and Michael take their latest assignment into protective custody, but Nikita learns of their hideout and attempts to thwart their plan.
Nikita rescues Jill, a journalist trying to expose a conspiracy involving Division and a major plane crash. Amanda interrogates Birkhoff.
episodes.title: Kill Jill

episodes.synopsis: Nikita revisits her past when she posed as a nanny for an influential government official and decides to right the wrong of his death.
episodes.title: Rough Trade

episodes.synopsis: Division operative Owen escapes from a bank robbery and becomes a fugitive. Alex attempts to warn Nikita, but she is busted by Thom.
episodes.title: The Guardian

episodes.synopsis: A bus of Division recruits is attacked by terrorists who kidnap Alex and Thom, both of whom are unaware that this is a test by Division.
episodes.title: Resistance

episodes.synopsis: Alex informs Nikita that one of the recruits has been activated to carry out a suicide mission. Nikita intercepts the recruit just as Michael arrives.
episodes.title: The Recruit

episodes.synopsis: If a U.S. senator agrees to help pass a bill that will continue to fund Division, the agency will cover up the senator's secret affair.
episodes.title: Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Michael temporarily team up to kill a terrorist. Alex is caught going through medical files inside Division and creates a lie about Jaden.
episodes.title: One Way

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Owen go to Chile in an effort to rescue Ryan from mercenaries, but they end up getting captured.
episodes.title: Dark Matter

episodes.synopsis: Alex is sent on her first kill mission. Birkhoff discovers the shell program that has been used to connect to Nikita in the outside world.
episodes.title: All the Way

episodes.synopsis: Nikita realizes Division has implanted a kill chip in Alex's head, who is now an agent.
episodes.title: Free

episodes.synopsis: A plan to foil Alex's first assassination assignment goes awry when Nikita trusts the wrong person.
episodes.title: Coup de Grace

episodes.synopsis: To help Ryan with a mission, Nikita must reassume an old identity she had while undercover at Division.
episodes.title: The Next Seduction

episodes.synopsis: While out on a mission, Alex runs into Irina, a woman from her past, and tries to help her.
episodes.title: Alexandra

episodes.synopsis: Alex is sedated to help her heal after her last mission, but Amanda takes advantage of Alex's drugged condition to question her.
episodes.title: Echoes

episodes.synopsis: Michael confronts Nikita and reveals that he knows Alex is the mole.
episodes.title: Covenants

episodes.synopsis: Nikita goes to London with Owen to retrieve one of Percy's black boxes; there, the two disagree about what to do with it.
episodes.title: Into The Dark

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Jaden are assigned an overseas mission, but when things go awry, Alex must decide whether to try to save the mission ... or herself.
episodes.title: Girl's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: When Nikita goes to a small town after one of Percy's black boxes, she is shocked to find the guardian of the box has abandoned her post.
episodes.title: Glass Houses

episodes.synopsis: Michael sends Nikita in to save the last person on the list of black box protectors, a CIA cryptographer named Malcolm.
episodes.title: Betrayals

episodes.synopsis: Percy makes a move to take over the CIA, Alex goes rogue, and Michael is trapped inside Division, unable to help Nikita when her life is in peril.
episodes.title: Pandora

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Michael plot to take down Division and Oversight. Amanda, who is now running Division, enlists Alex's help to stop them.
episodes.title: Game Change

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and a reluctant Michael join forces with Owen, who is searching for the mastermind behind the Regimen. Meanwhile, Percy demands to see Alex.
episodes.title: Falling Ash

episodes.synopsis: Amanda convinces Alex to kill a man who used to work for Alex's father. When Nikita disrupts Amanda's plan, Amanda takes what Nikita loves most.
episodes.title: Knightfall

episodes.synopsis: Nikita is stunned to hear her old Division partner Kelly has escaped from a Turkish prison, having believed Kelly died when Nikita fled Division.
episodes.title: Partners

episodes.synopsis: Michael wants to help a woman in danger whom he once romanced under Division orders. Sean begins to doubt Division's true motives.
episodes.title: Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: With her found birth certificate, Nikita and Michael track down her father. Percy tells Alex the black box could help her avenge her father's death.
episodes.title: 343 Walnut Lane

episodes.synopsis: Amanda intercepts messages between Nikita and Ryan, who is in prison and has learned how Oversight is funded. Alex faces someone from her past.
episodes.title: Clawback

episodes.synopsis: Michael helps Cassandra after hearing General Tupelov will kill her unless she returns money she allegedly stole, but Nikita is suspicious.
episodes.title: London Calling

episodes.synopsis: Sean captures Birkoff and, when he won't reveal where Nikita is hiding, Amanda tortures him. Meanwhile, Alex attempts to reclaim her father's empire.
episodes.title: Fair Trade

episodes.synopsis: Nikita turns to Owen to help her track down another black box, but discovers his unlikely employer that could jeopardize her whole operation.
episodes.title: Guardians

episodes.synopsis: Alex's mission to take down Gogol comes to a head as she infiltrates her childhood home and faces ghosts from her past.
episodes.title: Pale Fire

episodes.synopsis: Sean attacks Nikita and Michael to protect his mother. Percy gets the upper hand on Amanda and threatens to level Division unless she releases him.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Nikita must decide if she will try to save Division. Sean turns to Nikita, Michael and Alex for help.
episodes.title: Clean Sweep

episodes.synopsis: Percy threatens to kill Nikita's mentor, so she uses Madeline to send a message. Amanda tells Alex it's time to reveal Alexandra Udinov to the world.
episodes.title: Rogue

episodes.synopsis: Nikita is shocked by what Carla recounts of the night Nikita was arrested. Alex shows up at a Zetrov press conference to make an announcement.
episodes.title: Origins

episodes.synopsis: Amanda reluctantly offers Nikita a deal: Stop Percy from murdering Division's agents and Nikita can have Ryan.
episodes.title: Doublecross

episodes.synopsis: Michael is furious when he discovers a secret that Cassandra kept from him. Alex makes a last-ditch effort to find her mother.
episodes.title: Arising

episodes.synopsis: Amanda and Ari prepare to take over Zetrov. Alex surprises Ari by showing up at the board meeting with an old and powerful friend.
episodes.title: Power

episodes.synopsis: Nikita is tortured by someone she previously targeted. Percy plays mind games with Michael, Alex and Sean, pushing one of them to the brink of death.
episodes.title: Wrath

episodes.synopsis: After losing his life savings to Percy via a plan gone wrong, Birkhoff hacks into an old network, which trips a trap set by the FBI.
episodes.title: Shadow Walker

episodes.synopsis: Nikita opposes Ryan's plan to go to the CIA and is surprised when Michael takes Ryan's side. Sean is shot by Percy's men, shaking Alex to the core.
episodes.title: Dead Drop

episodes.synopsis: Percy threatens to set off a nuclear explosion. Nikita realizes the best way to stop Percy is to go into the belly of the beast: Division itself.
episodes.title: Crossbow

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Michael invade Division in an attempt to capture Percy, and Alex and Sean get caught in a deadly gunfire battle with the U.S. Marines.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Nikita launch a mission to bring in the rogue agents who failed to respond to the Division recall after Percy was killed.
A rogue Division agent has brainwashed a young girl and trained her to be a Division agent to help him on his own personal mission.
episodes.title: Innocence

episodes.synopsis: Nikita, Michael and Sean attempt to stop a terrorist attack but are one man down after Alex is shot. Meanwhile, Birkhoff and Sonia continue to bicker.
episodes.title: True Believer

episodes.synopsis: Amanda sends a rogue agent to spring Owen from a Russian prison, but he manages to escape her clutches and learns that Nikita is with Division now.
episodes.title: Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Division discovers one of their rogue agents has been elected president of Uzbekistan and is planning to kill the president of the United States.
episodes.title: The Sword's Edge

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Michael capture an arms dealer who is purchasing a weapon-jamming device for Ari. Meanwhile, Birkhoff is hot on the trail of Amanda's mole.
episodes.title: Sideswipe

episodes.synopsis: Birkhoff tells Nikita that Sonya is Amanda's mole and that Amanda has reactivated Sonya's kill chip and also placed a second mole in Division.
episodes.title: Intersection

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Owen face off against a rogue "cleaner" named Liam, while Michael takes a new position at Division.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: A rogue agent named Ray kidnaps his girlfriend, Kate, so Ryan dispatches the team to rescue her. Meanwhile, Sean makes a decision about Alex.
episodes.title: Survival Instincts

episodes.synopsis: Michael resumes his role inside Division running Operations. Nikita preps a secret mission that takes her into dangerous territory.
episodes.title: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: Amanda frames Sean for the assassination of the director of the CIA, and the CIA takes him into custody. Nikita promises Alex they will free Sean.
episodes.title: Black Badge

episodes.synopsis: Ari tells Nikita that Amanda has gone too far and is working with a terrorist who plans an attack on American soil.
episodes.title: With Fire

episodes.synopsis: In order to gain control of the black box, Amanda makes plans to kidnap Ari's son, Stefan, to use him as leverage. Ari begs Nikita for help.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Amanda holds Alex hostage and tells Nikita she will release Alex in exchange for Ari. Michael assigns Nikita and Sean to handle the exchange.
episodes.title: The Life We've Chosen

episodes.synopsis: When Nikita decides Division should take on a government mission to eliminate the president of Chad, Alex takes a stand and refuses to participate.
episodes.title: Inevitability

episodes.synopsis: Nikita and Michael learn of a new prosthetic hand that could have Michael back to his old self, but it comes at a steep price.
episodes.title: Tipping Point

episodes.synopsis: Alex confesses to Birkhoff her desire to leave Division. Amanda begins providing Owen with memories of his real past.
episodes.title: Masks

episodes.synopsis: Strapped down and drugged, Nikita is subjected to Amanda's horrific mental conditioning process, sending her on a terrible trip down memory lane.
episodes.title: Broken Home

episodes.synopsis: Undone by Amanda's programming, her inability to save everyone and her responsibility for the tragic events at Division, Alex violently strikes out.
episodes.title: Self Destruct

episodes.synopsis: The black box falls into the hands of a mutinous agent guided by Amanda. Nikita, Michael and Alex stage a daring operation to regain control of it.
episodes.title: High-Value Target

episodes.synopsis: Michael questions his fiancée's commitment to a life beyond Division's web of deceit, double-crosses and death, and he's not the only one with doubts.
episodes.title: Invisible Hand

episodes.synopsis: Amanda forces Nikita into a life-threatening situation where she has to choose between saving Michael -- or saving herself.
episodes.title: Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: With Nikita still on the run after being accused of a shocking crime, a news reporter gives her hope that she may be able to clear her name.
episodes.title: Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Nikita reunites with Michael, Birkhoff and Ryan on the team's aircraft command center, and Michael advises Nikita to let them help her clear her name.
episodes.title: Dead or Alive

episodes.synopsis: Evidence of Nikita being hired by Pakistan to kill the U.S. president escalates tension between the countries; Ryan becomes suspicious of Birkhoff.
episodes.title: Set-Up

episodes.synopsis: Jones takes control of the operation and offers Nikita and the team freedom and new identities if they'd be willing to walk away from the mission.
episodes.title: Pay-Off

episodes.synopsis: Ryan confesses a secret that could unravel Nikita's plans; Alex puts Sam in danger when she misjudges his intentions with a suitcase full of diamonds.
episodes.title: Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Nikita leaves the team behind and takes Alex on the road to exact revenge on MDK, leading her to make a shocking decision when she's cornered.
episodes.title: Canceled
